title: Discovery Channel new logo sans serif font
content:
It's just beautiful. Seen on [Brand New](http://web.archive.org/web/20141002102350/http:/www.underconsideration.com/brandnew/archives/its_a_small_globe_after_all.php).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141002102350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/discovery_channel_logo_5948.gif)

Thanks in advance.
author: dedaluz

comments.content: Thanks Jan. Always so responsive. I thought so, but was not sure.
